label: ProductInstance
comment: An instance of an individual product or batch of similar products produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process.

datatypeProperties.comment: The unique supplier assigned serial identifier for this trade product instance.
The unique kanban identifier for this trade product instance.
A unique registration identifier, such as a vehicle licence plate identification, for this trade product instance.
The unique lot identifier for this trade product instance.
A unique serial identifier for this trade product instance.
The unique global serial identifier for this trade product instance.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value before which it is best to consume the items contained in this trade product instance.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value by after which the items contained in the trade product instance should not be sold.

objectProperties.comment: A product handling process applied to this trade product instance, such as manufacturing or storage.
The packaging event for this trade product instance.
The production event for this trade product instance.

referencedBy.comment: An individual instance of this trade product.
